cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a method to improve the training of neural networks by adding noise to activation functions. This is a topic that is relevant to several sub-fields of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), neural networks (cs.NE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), and control systems (cs.SY). Given that the paper focuses on improving the training of neural networks, cs.LG and cs.NE are the most likely sub-categories. However, since the paper also discusses the potential applications of the proposed method in computer vision and control systems, cs.CV and cs.SY are also likely sub-categories. Finally, since the paper proposes a novel approach to improving the training of neural networks, it could also be relevant to the general area of optimization (cs.Optimization).
